div.p: Having to be in a different role, something new, and it’s like being you don’t really know what’s going on around you and you really want to know
and that’s the most because I really want to know, I really want to do the work and that’s the most difficult thing that's what I see as the most difficult thing
not being able to know everything that’s actually going on. I don’t see myself as being thrown in at the deep end to be honest because I’m getting there, I’m getting
very familiar with the work but that is important, I really want to know I don’t really want people to sort of... I want to get on with it
